member.summary: Base Url used in call all APIs

member.name: P:Unifonic.UnifonicClient.AppSid
member.summary: A character string that uniquely identifies your app, you will find your AppSid in "Dev Tools" after you login to Unifonic Digital Platform

member.name: M:Unifonic.UnifonicRestClient.GetBalance
member.summary: Get account balance

member.name: M:Unifonic.UnifonicRestClient.AddSender(System.String)
member.summary: Add a sender name
member.param: Sender ID should not exceed 11 characters or 16 numbers, only English letters allowed with no special characters or spaces

member.name: M:Unifonic.UnifonicRestClient.GetSenderStatus(System.String)
member.summary: Get status of a sender name
member.param: Sender ID should not exceed 11 characters or 16 numbers, only English letters allowed with no special characters or spaces

member.name: M:Unifonic.UnifonicRestClient.GetSenders
member.summary: Get list of your sender IDs values with related status for each, IsDefault code and creation date

member.name: M:Unifonic.UnifonicRestClient.DeleteSender(System.String)
member.summary: Remove a sender name
member.param: Sender ID should not exceed 11 characters or 16 numbers, only English letters allowed with no special characters or spaces

member.name: M:Unifonic.UnifonicRestClient.GetAppDefaultSender
member.summary: Get The default SenderID, to be considered by your application to send text messages

member.name: M:Unifonic.UnifonicRestClient.ChangeAppDefaultSender(System.String)
member.summary: Change the default SenderID
member.param: Sender ID should not exceed 11 characters or 16 numbers, only English letters allowed with no special characters or spaces

member.name: M:Unifonic.UnifonicRestClient.NumberInsight(System.String)
member.summary: Check the reachability of the number
member.param: Destination mobile number, mobile number must be in international format without 00 or + Example: (4452023498)

member.name: M:Unifonic.UnifonicRestClient.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new client
member.param: String that uniquely identifies your app, you will find your AppSid in "Dev Tools" after you login to Unifonic Digital Platform

member.name: M:Unifonic.UnifonicRestClient.SendSmsMessage(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Nullable{Unifonic.SendSmsType},System.Nullable{Unifonic.SendPriority},System.Nullable{System.DateTime})
member.summary: Send SMS message to only one recipient; you must have sufficient balance and an active package to send to your desired destination
member.param: Destination mobile number, mobile number must be in international format without 00 or + Example: (4452023498)
Message body supports both English and Unicode characters, concatenated messages is supported
The SenderID to send from, default SenderID is used unless else stated
Possible Value is "Flash", support only the following destination KSA- STC
Send high priority messages, possible value is " High " only. High priority sending is available for advanced plans and through balance
Schedule send messages,Note that if time is in the past then message will be sent directly

member.name: M:Unifonic.UnifonicRestClient.SendBulkSmsMessages(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Nullable{System.DateTime})
member.summary: Send bulk SMS messages to multi recipients separated by commas, Using SendBulk API requires authorized API Access, to get your authorized access contact us.
member.param: Destination mobile numbers separated by commas, mobile numbers must be in international format without 00 or + Example: (4452023498)
Message body supports both English and Unicode characters, concatenated messages is supported
The SenderID to send from, default SenderID is used unless else stated
Schedule send messages,Note that if time is in the past then message will be sent directly

member.name: M:Unifonic.UnifonicRestClient.GetSmsMessageStatus(System.String)
member.summary: Get status of an SMS message
member.param: A unique ID that identifies a message

member.name: M:Unifonic.UnifonicRestClient.GetSmsMessagesReport(System.Nullable{System.DateTime},System.Nullable{System.DateTime},System.String,System.Nullable{Unifonic.SmsMessageStatus},System.Nullable{Unifonic.DlrStatus},System.String)
member.summary: Get a summarized report of sent messages
member.param: The start date for the report time interval
The end date for the report time interval
Filter messages report according to a specific sender ID
Filter messages report according to a specific message status, "Sent", "Queued", "Rejected" or "Failed"
Message delivery status returned by networks, the possible values are "Delivered" or "Undeliverable", and are available for advanced plans
Filter messages report according to a specific destination country

member.name: M:Unifonic.UnifonicRestClient.GetSmsMessagesDetails(System.String,System.Nullable{System.DateTime},System.Nullable{System.DateTime},System.String,System.Nullable{Unifonic.SmsMessageStatus},System.Nullable{Unifonic.DlrStatus},System.String,System.Nullable{System.Int32})
member.summary: Get the latest 10,000 created messages
member.param: A unique ID that identifies a message
The start date for the report time interval
The end date for the report time interval
Filter messages report according to a specific sender ID
Filter messages report according to a specific message status, "Sent", "Queued", "Rejected" or "Failed"
Message delivery status returned by networks, the possible values are "Delivered" or "Undeliverable", and are available for advanced plans
Filter messages report according to a specific destination country
Number of messages to return in the report, where the limit maximum is 10,000 and messages are sorted by sending date

member.name: M:Unifonic.UnifonicRestClient.MessagesKeyword(System.String,System.String,Unifonic.KeywordRules,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Nullable{Unifonic.RequestType},System.String)
member.summary: Keyword enables you to manage your interactive numbers keywords , create auto replies or set a webhook directly from your API.
member.param: The Inbound number to create an inbound message rule for.
The received keyword in the inbound number
The inbound message keyword rule , possible values are : Is, StartsWith, Contains, Any. Only "Is" is available for a shared number
Set any Sender ID for your response action
Set an auto reply to send back to the user (i.e: You have been successfully registered )
Defines the source that you want to make the callback to, for example "www.google.com"
Set the parameters that the source takes ,for example https://www.google.com/search?msg=hello then your parameter that you have to set is msg
Set the parameters that the source takes ,for example https://www.google.com/search?rec=966666666666 then your parameter that you have to set is rec
Defines the HTTP callback methods , it can be either "Post" or "Get"
Your inbound number for example 70001

member.name: M:Unifonic.UnifonicRestClient.MessagesInbox(System.String,System.String,System.Nullable{System.DateTime},System.Nullable{System.DateTime})
member.summary: Retrieve all incoming messages to your active shared or dedicated numbers.
member.param: The Inbound number to create an inbound message rule for.
The received keyword in the inbound number
The start date
The end date

member.name: M:Unifonic.UnifonicRestClient.MessagesPricing(System.String)
member.summary: Retrieve outbound messaging pricing for a given country
member.param: Two letters country code, i.e. "SA" for Saudi Arabia

member.name: M:Unifonic.UnifonicRestClient.GetScheduledMessages(System.String)
member.summary: Get a summarized report for scheduled sent messages
member.param: A unique ID that identifies a message

member.name: M:Unifonic.UnifonicRestClient.StopScheduledMessage(System.String)
member.summary: Stop scheduled messages
member.param: A unique ID that identifies a message

member.name: M:Unifonic.UnifonicRestClient.SendVerificationCode(System.String,System.String,System.Nullable{Unifonic.VerificationSecurityType},System.Nullable{System.TimeSpan},System.String,System.Nullable{Unifonic.Channel},System.Nullable{Unifonic.TtsCallLanguages},System.Nullable{System.Int32})
member.summary: Provide a user number to be verified,it will send pass code via text message or TTS call or both to the provided number Note that generated pass-code will be concatenated with this body before sending to recipient
member.param: Destination mobile number, mobile numbers must be in international format without 00 or + Example: (4452023498)
Message body,will be used in text message or in TTS call or both
The pass code validity usage ,possible values are "OTP" -One Time pass code- that can be used only for one time and "TSP" -Time Session pass code- that can be used many times until it's expired
The expiry time of a pass code , after which the pass code will get expired.The default value is 24h , and expiry format is HH:mm:ss
The SenderId to send from, App default SenderId is used unless else stated
The desired communication channel, possible values are "TextMessage", "Call" or "Both"
If the channel was set to "Call", language must be defined to enable the text to speech call
Time To Live,time in minutes to define when the TTS call will be sent, default value is 1 minute and maximum value is 15 minutes, and should not exceed the expiry time for the code

member.name: M:Unifonic.UnifonicRestClient.GetVerificationDetails(System.String,System.Nullable{System.DateTime},System.Nullable{System.DateTime},System.String)
member.summary: Retrieve verification details such as authenticated, in progress, unauthenticated numbers, reasons for unauthenticated and the used channel
member.param: TODO:document these

member.name: M:Unifonic.UnifonicRestClient.VerifyNumber(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Verify if the pass code matches the number and if the mobile number is authenticated not
member.param: Destination mobile number, mobile numbers must be in international format without 00 or + Example: (4452023498)
The code received on recipient mobile

member.name: M:Unifonic.UnifonicRestClient.Call(System.String,System.Uri,System.Nullable{Unifonic.CallType},System.String,System.Nullable{System.DateTime},System.Nullable{System.Int32},System.Nullable{Unifonic.Repeat})
member.summary: Make a call to recipient
member.param: Destination mobile number, mobile number must be in international format without 00 or + Example: (4452023498)
The URL Link of the audio file,supported formats are WAV and Mp3, Example : https://voiceusa.s3.amazonaws.com/voiceWavFiles1423399184883.wav
Defines the type of the call , note that pull value is used to collect user responses
Sender callerID, this can be any international mobile number
Schedule the call
Add a pause at the beginning of the call value in seconds, values between (0 – 5 seconds )
Repeat the voice call , note: this option can be used only if CallType is set to Pull

member.name: M:Unifonic.UnifonicRestClient.GetCallStatus(System.String)
member.summary: Get status of a call
member.param: A unique ID that identifies a voice call

member.name: M:Unifonic.UnifonicRestClient.GetCallsDetails(System.String,System.Nullable{System.DateTime},System.Nullable{System.DateTime},System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Get the latest 10,000 created calls
member.param: A unique ID that identifies a voice call
The start date for the report time interval
The end date for the report time interval
Call Status , the possible values are : (Queued, Completed , Terminated, Busy,NoAnswer , Rejected and Failed)
Filter messages report according to a specific destination country

member.name: M:Unifonic.UnifonicRestClient.TtsCall(System.String,System.String,Unifonic.TtsCallLanguages,System.Nullable{Unifonic.CallType},System.String,System.Nullable{System.DateTime},System.Nullable{Unifonic.Voice},System.Nullable{System.Int32},System.Nullable{Unifonic.Repeat})
member.summary: Make a call using Text to speech,a voice file will be generated based on content and played to the recipient
member.param: Destination mobile number, mobile number must be in international format without 00 or + Example: (4452023498)
Text to send
The language of the text Synthesis , the possible values are :( Arabic, English )
Defines the type of the call , note that pull value is used to collect user responses
Sender callerID, this can be any international mobile number
Schedule Calls
Change voice gender
Add a pause at the beginning of the call value in seconds, values between (0 – 5 seconds )
Repeat the voice call , note: this option can be used only if CallType is set to Pull

member.name: M:Unifonic.UnifonicRestClient.GetScheduledCalls(System.String)
member.summary: Get a summarized report for scheduled calls
member.param: A unique ID that identifies a voice call

member.summary: Stop scheduled call
member.param: A unique ID that identifies a voice call

member.summary: Destination mobile number, mobile numbers must be in international format without 00 or + Example: (4452023498) TODO: why RecipientNumber not Recipient? , Rename it to Recipient

member.summary: The country that the voice call has sent to

member.summary: Created call status, the possible values are : (Queued, Completed , Terminated, Busy,NoAnswer , Rejected and Failed)

member.summary: The Date that the voice call has been created TODO: We should unify names,either stick with DateCreated or use TimeCreated,prefer DateCreated

member.summary: TODO: We should unify names,either stick with TimeSent or use StartTime,prefer StartTime //TODO: How it's different from DateStarted/TimeStarted?

member.summary: //TODO: how it's different from TimeSent? both have same value
